DPM_Buffer_t Struct Reference

DPM Buffer Interface. More...

#include <control/dpm/dpm.h>

Data Fields

uint8_t * ptrBuffer [DPM_MAX_BUFFER]
 Pointer to the buffer.
 
uint32_t size [DPM_MAX_BUFFER]
 Size of the result buffer.
 

Detailed Description

DPM Buffer Interface.

The DPM processing chain receive data buffers which are to be processed. The DPC processes these buffers and generates the results which are then passed to the application. The structure encompasses this information.
